about.title: About Excellence Academy
about.tagline: Where tradition meets innovation in education
about.missionText: To provide world-class education that nurtures academic excellence, strong character, and innovative thinking in every student.
about.visionText: To be the leading educational institution in East Africa, recognized for academic excellence and holistic student development.
about.excellenceDesc: We strive for the highest standards in all aspects of education.
about.integrityDesc: We uphold honesty, transparency, and ethical behavior.
about.innovationDesc: We embrace new ideas and creative approaches to learning.
about.communityDesc: We foster a supportive environment where everyone belongs.
about.messageText: Welcome to Excellence Academy, where we believe every child has the potential to achieve greatness. Our dedicated faculty and staff work tirelessly to create an environment that challenges students academically while nurturing their individual talents and character. We combine traditional educational values with innovative teaching methods to prepare our students not just for examinations, but for life.
about.scheduleVisit: Schedule a campus visit to experience Excellence Academy firsthand.

admissions.joinText: We welcome students who are eager to learn and grow in a supportive, challenging environment.
